summary: Tested 2 new features: 1) Weekly Planner - Multiple recipes per day (up to 4), 2) Recipe Library - Meal Type Filters (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snack). Both features working correctly.
passed_tests: Frontend: Recipe Library page loads with meal type filter buttons (All, Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snack)
Frontend: Meal type filter buttons have correct icons (Coffee, Sun, Moon, Cookie)
Frontend: Breakfast filter shows recipes with pancake/egg/toast keywords
Frontend: Lunch filter shows recipes with salad/sandwich/soup keywords
Frontend: Dinner filter shows recipes with steak/pasta/curry keywords
Frontend: Snack filter shows recipes with cookie/fruit keywords
Frontend: Meal type filters work alongside existing category (Diet) filters
Frontend: Combined filters (Dinner + Veggie) correctly narrow results
Frontend: Filter reset (All) restores full recipe list
Frontend: Weekly Planner page loads with add meal buttons for each day
Frontend: Can add 1st meal to Monday via popover
Frontend: Can add 2nd meal to Monday via popover
Frontend: Can add 3rd meal to Monday via popover
Frontend: Can add 4th meal to Monday via popover
Frontend: Add meal button becomes disabled after 4 meals per day
Frontend: Header shows correct meal count (4 meals planned)
Frontend: Toast notification 'Meal added!' appears after adding meal
Frontend: Recipe popover has tabs (Suggested, By Ingredient, All)
critical_code_review_comments: MAX_MEALS_PER_DAY=4 constant correctly replaces old MAX_MEALS_PER_WEEK=7
canAddToDay() function properly checks meal count per day
MEAL_TYPE_CONFIG with keyword arrays is well-structured for extensibility
getRecipeMealType() function correctly infers meal type from recipe name using keyword matching
Meal type filter state (selectedMealType) properly integrates with existing filters
seed_data_creation: Created 10 test recipes with meal-type keywords (pancake, salad, steak, cookie, etc.) and categories (vegetarian, healthy, low-fat) for testing. Cleaned up after testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Two new features verified: 1) Weekly Planner now allows up to 4 meals per day (changed from 7 meals per week limit). Add button is disabled when day reaches 4 meals. 2) Recipe Library has new meal type filters that use keyword matching in recipe names. Test session token: test_session_1770678799618 can be reused.

weekly_planner_multiple_meals_per_day.details: Users can add up to 4 recipes per day (breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack). The add meal button is disabled after 4 meals. Previous 7 meals/week limit removed.

recipe_library_meal_type_filters.details: Four meal type filter buttons (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snack) filter recipes by keyword matching in recipe names. Works alongside existing category filters.

category_filters_with_meal_type.details: Existing category (Diet) filters work correctly alongside new meal type filters. Combined filtering narrows results as expected.

keyword_matching_behavior.note: First matching meal type wins - e.g., 'Fruit Salad Bowl' matches 'salad' (lunch) before 'fruit' (snack)
